title: Implement player profile view page
description: Create a player profile page that displays player information, their team assignments, availability history, and upcoming fixtures. This provides players with a central dashboard to see their status.
acceptance_criteria: Player profile page accessible at /players/profile or /my-profile
Displays player name, club affiliation, and teams
Shows upcoming fixtures player is eligible for
Shows availability status for each upcoming fixture
Uses existing auth middleware for player access
testing_requirements: Verify profile loads for authenticated players
Test with players in multiple teams
Test with players with no availability history

context.user_story: As a player, I want to see my profile with my teams and upcoming fixtures so I can quickly understand my commitments
